title: Man of tomorrow
creator_credit: Army Kinema Corporation, Ronald H. Riley and David H. Villiers
brief_description: Army training in leadership, given mainly at an “Outward Bound” school, where the emphasis is on character building rather than on traditional military training. The stories, humorously told, of a group of boys drawn from all Corps of the Army, who are seen following the various pursuits which fit them for leadership in Army careers.
